author: Liang Min
notes: 梁敏 / Liang Min. 毛难语简志 / Maonan yu jian zhi (A Sketch of Maonan). Beijing: 民族出版社: 新华书店发行 / Min zu chu ban she: Xin hua shu dian fa xing, 1980.Maonan tones:1 = /42/2 = /231/3 = /51/4 = /24/5 = /44/6 = /213/7 = /55/ (short), 44 (long)8 = /23/ (short), 24 (long)Maonan tones are very similar to those of Luocheng Zhuang and Huanjiang Zhuang.
